title: Set design, makeup, lighting and costumes help bring ‘Charlotte’s Web’ to life (Pittsburg State University) ...
text: ( Source : Pittsburg State University ) By itself, the large cast for the Pittsburg State University Theatre 's production of ' Charlotte's Web ' is impressive. Add to that a flexible and changing set and lighting, dozens of fanciful costumes,
